interface.name: kf5_taskbar
interface.description: This interface manages client windows. Only one client can bind this interface at a time.

request.name: minimize_windows
request.description: Tell the compositor to minimize all windows.

request.name: restore_windows
request.description: Tell the compositor to restore all windows.

request.name: show_desktop
request.description: Tell the compositor to hide all windows and reveal the desktop. Windows position is not changed, call kf5_taskbar.hide_desktop to restore windows.

request.name: hide_desktop
request.description: Tell the compositor to show all windows again. Windows are shown exactly where they were before calling kf5_taskbar.show_desktop.

event.name: window_mapped

description.summary: notify the client that a window was mapped

event.description:
This event will be sent immediately after a is mapped.
Values for state argument are described by kf5_taskbar.window_state.

interface.name: kf5_window
interface.description: Only one client can bind this interface at a time.

request.name: set_state
request.description:
Set client window state.
Values for state argument are described by kf5_taskbar.window_state.

request.name: set_workspace
request.description: Maps the window to a different workspace. If -1 is specified as workspace index, the window will be mapped on all workspaces.

request.name: raise
request.description: Raise this window in the stacking order.

request.name: lower
request.description: Lower this window in the stacking order.

event.name: title_changed
event.description: This event will be sent as soon as the window title is changed.

event.name: app_id_changed
event.description: This event will be sent as soon as the window class is changed.

event.name: state_changed
event.description:
This event will be sent as soon as the window state changes.
Values for state argument are described by kf5_taskbar.window_state.

event.name: workspace_changed

description.summary: window was moved to another workspace

event.description:
This event will be sent when a window is moved to another workspace or if it becomes visible on all workspaces.
A -1 workspace index means the window is visible on all workspaces.

event.name: unmapped
event.description: This event will be sent immediately after the window is closed and its surface is unmapped.
